# Pull Request

## Summary
Describe what this PR does in 2â€“3 sentences.

## Changes
List the main changes in this PR, for example:

- Added a new playbook: `playbooks/...`
- Updated inventory: `inventory.yml`
- Updated documentation: `docs/...`
- Refactored existing tasks

## Testing
Explain how you tested your changes. Examples:

- Ran: `ansible-playbook -i inventory.yml playbooks/vcenter_about.yml`
- Verified output and no errors
- Tested against lab vCenter

## Checklist
- [ ] I did NOT commit any secrets (passwords, tokens, real vcenter.yml)
- [ ] My changes are focused on a single topic/feature
- [ ] The code/playbooks run without errors (basic sanity check)
- [ ] I updated docs or comments if needed
